paper_meta.Paper_title: A point-of-care SARS-CoV-2 test based on reverse transcription loop-mediated isothermal amplification without RNA extraction with diagnostic performance same as RT-PCR.

Methods: other:Direct (extraction-free) RT-LAMP workflow is referenced, but no sample-prep protocol details are described on the provided pages; mentions 'mechanical lysis' and an SOP in supplementary material (Appendix A) without procedural specifics.
